channel.title: Plz help me i have a problem with making me a owner or admin or mod
channel.description:
plz help me when i go to charcters my char player rights 3 and save and go to game it doesnt work =( the server source is dragon scape v.2 or 2.3cant remember lol but the owner char name is wolf and his characters right are 3 and i made them 2 to see if that helped and it didnt plz help me
and another question how do i edit my server ? and how do i make my server to say ploxscape istead of dragonscape? plz help me i need to know

item.title: Plz help me i have a problem with making me a owner or admin or mod
item.dc:creator: @Kitno Kitno
item.description:
@Kitno wrote:

Log out completely. Turn your server off.

Go into your character file through characters > yourname.txt

Find

character-rights = 0

3 is owner (sometimes you cant see crown), 2 is admin (can see crown, 1 is mod, 0 is regular, -1 is banned.

Read full topic
item.source: Plz help me i have a problem with making me a owner or admin or mod
